snippet: The RTB 500 is meant to provide the real-time price of media on 500 leading publishers’ sites.
abstract: Advertising column; MediaPost Communications is introducing index that will track in real time movements in price for ads bought and sold on the websites of 500 publishers; index is meant to echo Standard & Poor's 500-stock index.
lead_paragraph: The RTB 500 is meant to provide the real-time price of media on 500 leading publishers’ sites.

headline.main: Mimicking the S.&P. With an Index for Ad Prices at 500 Publishers
headline.print_headline: Mimicking the S.&P. With an Index for Ad Prices at 500 Publishers
